Event.Text: We pulled up to a MSS automated refill station. We can trade alcohol for different supplies and healing, or sell our supplies for extra alcohol. The automated AI states out of its staticy speakers, "Welcome to your local Mars Secure and Safety refilling station. Services include and limited too. Buying of supplies. Selling of supplies. Healing of patients. Currency accepted, Mars grown alcohol" Before anyone can begin trading, Meg mentions that when she was a kid, she learnt how to mess around with general MSS hardware. She hops out of the rover, finds a loose panel on the side of the station and begins ripping wires out. Suddenly, the prices advertised are set to a lower amount!
